name: Peridot Technologies
overview: We are Independent Software Vendor and recently launched a Windows 8 App. Publishing app for Windows 8 that comes with over 100 built-in templates for various industries like Real Estate, Travel and Tourism, Institutes, Organizations, Hotels, Entertainment, Showrooms, Events Management and many other Small Businesses, Plus many more templates can be downloaded from online templates marketplace. Make flyers, brochures, certificates, posters and similar publishing docs in few minutes. FREE App with Sponsored Ads on Templates , but user may buy License to remove Ads App can be downloaded from http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/en-US/app/easy-flyer-creator/de6991ee-e0ff-4ee5-9a63-427608e1e4d4
